actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the estate of a decedent to use the capital loss carryover of the decedent as a deduction against estate tax.
short_title: Community-Based Mental Health Infrastructure Improvements Act

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from the gross estate of a decedent for capital losses which the decedent was eligibile to carry over to subsequent taxable years at the time of the decedent's death.
